comments.text:
I have several Firefox windows open (and several tabs in each).  I have disabled Windows' Group By option, so I see all the firefox windows in the taskbar, each with the Firefox logo and several letters of the page title.  I often wind up opening several tabs of my favorite web apps (such as Google Calendar, Pandora, etc) because I can't find them at a glance if they're even open.

If an tab is Pinned as and App Tab, and an app tab is currently active, the Firefox logo which is used as the program window icon should be replaced by the favicon for that app.  Then I can easily and quickly find those windows on my taskbar.

This is a significant step towards integrating web apps transparently with desktop apps as far as user experience is concerned.
